mapper.select: SELECT seckill.* FROM mall_seckill seckill where del_flag = 0 order by seckill.seckill_end_time desc
mapper.update: UPDATE mall_seckill set stock = stock -1 where mall_seckill_id = #{param.mallSeckillId} AND DATE_FORMAT(seckill_start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.killTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND DATE_FORMAT(seckill_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.killTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND stock >0
